snippet: Cambodia has asked that Jane A. Levine, who sits on a State Department panel on cultural property issues, recuse herself because her employer, Sotheby’s, is named in a lawsuit over an ancient Khmer statue it seeks to sell.
abstract: Cambodian government asks that Jane A Levine, Sotheby's executive who sits on State Department panel on cultural property issues, recuse herself from panel's deliberations on import restrictions for Cambodian antiquities; Cambodia cites potential conflict of interest in fact that Sotheby's is embroiled in lawsuit over ownership of an ancient Khmer statue.
lead_paragraph: Cambodia has asked that Jane A. Levine, who sits on a State Department panel on cultural property issues, recuse herself because her employer, Sotheby’s, is named in a lawsuit over an ancient Khmer statue it seeks to sell.

headline.seo: Cambodia Sees Ethical Conflict in Import Panel
headline.main: Cambodia Sees Ethical Conflict in Import Panel
headline.print_headline: Cambodia Sees Ethical Conflict In Import Panel
